project_abstract.cdata: The Highway Reconstruction Project will consist of: (a) construction of the Mahalapye-Serule road (150 km) to two-lane bituminous standards; (b) consulting services to: (i) assist the Borrower in bid evaluation and supervise construction of the Mahalapye-Serule road; (ii) assist the Borrower in the identification and preparation of a rural feeder road construction program; (c) assistance for road maintenance for: (i) gazetted roads: The recommendations of the Road Maintenance Study being carried out under the Third Road Project will be implemented; and (ii) district roads: The District Roads Maintenance Program, initiated under the Third Road Project, will be extended to two additional districts; and (d) provision of training equipment and construction of new classrooms and office space for the Roads Department Training School.
